question: The Indian women team of which game has acquired a direct berth to participate in the World Cup 2021?
explanation:
The International Cricket Council has recently announced that the India women's cricket team has acquired a direct berth to participate in the ICC Women's Cricket World Cup 2021
The World Cup event is scheduled to be held in New Zealand from February 6 to March 7 in 2021. With 23 points, Indian team has joined the group of 5 teams along with New Zealand, Australia, England and South Africa, which have been already qualified.
